The game is not finished, but what's done is at least a taste of what we intended for the game to be. We plan to finish it with actual challenges and more polish over the next week or two as we find time.

Controls:

Space - Start battle, or restart game (if a battle is ongoing)

Right click + Drag - Move camera

Drag cards onto your units to equip them. Cards can also be dragged back to your hand.
